block.p: In the following reports, the listed at price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent list
Number of bedrooms Number of full bathrooms Number of half bathrooms Weeks on market
*Sale in this price category not available.
575-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; foyer, renovated kitchen, h/w floors, west exposure; maintenance $624, 30% tax deductible; listed at $282,000. Broker: Simone Song Properties.
550-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; living-room fireplace, 10-ft. ceilings, h/w floors, laundry room in building; maintenance $766, 40% tax deductible; listed at $449,000. Broker: Citi Habitats.

900-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, windowed kitchen, renovated bath; maintenance $1,147, 45% tax deductible; listed at $650,000 (multiple bids). Brokers: Halstead Property; Bellmarc.
950-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, balcony off living room, park view; maintenance $1,234, 57% tax deductible; listed at $999,000. Broker: Corcoran Group.

1,410-sq.-ft. condo in a recently renovated prewar loft building; keyed elevator, high-end appliances, washer/dryer, 10-ft. ceilings; common charge $700; taxes $8,400; listed at $1.675 million. Broker: Citi Habitats.

625-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; renovated eat-in kitchen with upgraded appliances, h/w floors, pool in complex; maintenance $515, 50% tax deductible; listed at $129,000. Broker: Sari Kingsley.
1,300-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, h/w floors, c/a, pool in complex; maintenance $889, 50% tax deductible; listed at $395,000. Broker: Susan E. Goldy.
99-year-old ranch; renovated baths and eat-in kitchen, family room, h/w floors, finished basement, 1-car garage, 50-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $4,021; listed at $748,888. Broker: Re/Max Millennium.
1,855-sq.-ft. duplex condo in a brownstone; granite counters, stainless-steel appliances, marble baths, c/a, garden; common charge $444; taxes $2,652; listed at $1.19 million. Broker: Warren Lewis.

72-year-old brick and stucco town house; renovated kitchen and baths, family room, fireplace; new heating, plumbing and electrical systems; 16-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $4,672; listed at $1.467 million. Broker: Terrace.

42-year-old 2nd-floor co-op; on canal w/water view from deck, L-shaped living and dining room, efficiency kitchen; maintenance $765, 60% tax deductible; listed at $225,000. Broker: Fairfield Realty Services.

5-year-old Victorian-style house; 2-story entry, great-room fireplace, eat-in kitchen, c/a, 2 heat zones, 0.2-acre lot; taxes $14,332; listed at $570,000. Brokers: Daniel Gale Sotheby's; Prudential Douglas Elliman.

56-year-old split-level; living-room fireplace, updated eat-in kitchen, c/a, h/w floors, new windows, patio, 1-car garage, 68-by-104-ft. lot; taxes $8,326; listed at $715,000. Broker: Prudential Douglas Elliman.

81-year-old cottage; master suite with French doors to garden and pool, fireplace, library with view of pond, c/a, 2.5-acre lot; taxes $11,508; listed at $1.1 million. Brokers: Daniel Gale Sotheby's; Piping Rock.

57-year-old ranch; heated pool, tennis courts, 2 fireplaces, great room, basement gym and game room, 2-car garage, 3.34-acre lot; taxes $32,626 ; listed at $2.149 million. Brokers: Shawn Elliott; Hunt Ashley.

1,290-sq.-ft. 21-year-old town-house condo; foyer, living-room fireplace, skylights, deck; common charge $269; taxes $4,459; listed at $319,000. Brokers: River Towns GMAC; Coldwell Banker Residential.
51-year-old colonial; entry hall, living-room fireplace, eat-in kitchen, deck, fenced yard, 0.78-acre lot; taxes $10,459; listed at $599,000. Brokers: Houlihan Lawrence; Prudential Holmes & Kennedy.
73-year-old colonial; living-room fireplace, updated kitchen, skylights, high ceilings, fenced yard, 0.11-acre lot on cul-de-sac; taxes $13,342; listed at $635,000. Broker: Sotheby's.
21-year-old contemporary; 2 fireplaces, master suite with 2 baths, 3.03-acre lot on cul-de-sac; taxes $35,266; listed at $1.275 million. Brokers: Prudential Holmes & Kennedy; Prudential Centennial.

78-year-old raised ranch; fireplace and beamed ceiling in living room, eat-in cook's kitchen, cathedral ceilings, 0.28-acre lot on cul-de-sac; taxes $19,080; listed at $1.599 million. Broker: Sotheby's.

57-year-old vinyl-sided house; family room, fireplace, cathedral ceilings, h/w floors, deck, 69-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $7,101; listed at $274,900 (multiple bids). Brokers: Coldwell Banker Currier & Lazier; Weichert.

73-year-old aluminum-sided Cape Cod; family room, den, cathedral ceilings, finished basement, deck, 1-car garage, 0.22-acre lot; taxes $8,685; listed at $439,000. Brokers: Coldwell Banker New City; Weichert.

New stone and vinyl-sided contemporary; 2-story foyer, 2-story living room with fireplace, family room, pantry, den, whirlpool, h/w floors, 3-car garage; taxes not yet assessed; listed at $659,000. Broker: Weichert.

New stone and stucco colonial; island kitchen, breakfast room, family room with 2-story fireplace, cathedral ceilings, 3-car garage, 0.97-acre lot; taxes $21,779; listed at $1.149 million. Broker: Prudential Rand.

134-year-old stucco colonial; 4 fireplaces, solarium, 101/2-ft. ceilings, h/w and marble floors, whirlpool, deck, 2-car garage; taxes $18,366; listed at $1.55 million. Brokers: Sanders Properties; Baer & McIntosh.
37-year-old condo; h/w floors, eat-in kitchen, den, community pool; common charge $325 including utilities; taxes $2,814; listed at $147,900. Broker: Prudential N.J. Properties.
51-year-old ranch; eat-in-kitchen, c/a, finished full basement, deck, storage shed; 0.2-acre lot; taxes $5,255; listed at $385,000 (multiple bids). Broker: Weichert.

21-year-old Tudor; eat-in-kitchen, brick fireplace in family room, pantry, laundry room, attached 2-car garage; 1.44-acre lot; taxes $9,491; listed at $819,000 (multiple bids). Broker: Re/Max Premier.

36-year-old colonial; updated eat-in-kitchen w/high-end appliances, updated baths, family-room fireplace, attached 2-car garage; 0.95-acre lot; taxes $11,975; listed at $1.05 million. Brokers: Weichert; Keller Williams.

New colonial; 5 fireplaces, recreation room, attached 4-car garage, barn, pond, 2-bedroom cottage w/2-car garage; 8.12-acre lot; taxes not yet assessed; listed at $5.9 million. Brokers: Turpin; Coldwell Banker.
830-sq.-ft. 32-year-old ranch-style condo; renovated kitchen and bath, c/a, deck, pool and clubhouse in complex; common charge $390; taxes $2,556; listed at $235,000. Brokers: Neumann; Weichert.

2-year-old vinyl-sided colonial; dining-room fireplace, eat-in kitchen, vaulted ceilings, h/w floors, whirlpool, c/a, 2-car garage, 0.19-acre lot; taxes $6,250; listed at $434,900. Broker: Prudential Connecticut.
101-year-old colonial; a legal 2-family used as a 1-family, upgraded appliances, guest suite w/kitchen, 0.1-acre lot; taxes $4,122; listed at $769,000. Brokers: Sotheby's; Coldwell Banker Greenwich.

6-year-old vinyl-sided center-hall colonial; family room, h/w floors, c/a, whirlpool, h/w floors, 2-car garage, 0.36-acre lot; taxes $8,816; listed at $1.188 million. Broker: Coldwell Banker Greenwich.

163-year-old wood colonial; family room, 3 fireplaces, high beamed ceilings, wide-plank h/w floors, c/a, pool, 3-car garage, 2.05-acre lot; taxes $18,599; listed at $1.599 million. Broker: Prudential Connecticut.
